tokenColors.name: [Meta Brace] — The main color for Meta Brace
[Storage] — The color for Storage Type Arrow Function
[HTML] - Quotes. Different color to handle expanded selection
[MARKDOWN] - Color for Text inside inline code block `code`
[MARKDOWN] - Color for Punctuation — Heading, `Code` and fenced ```code blocks```, **Bold**
[ITALLICS] All the awesome itallics live here.
